snippet: Striker Jozy Altidore, a likely member of the United States national team for two World Cup qualifiers against Jamaica, says Jurgen Klinsmann is not seeking dirty play.
lead_paragraph: Striker Jozy Altidore, a likely member of the United States national team for two World Cup qualifiers against Jamaica, says Jurgen Klinsmann is not seeking dirty play.

headline.seo: Altidore Hears U.S. Coach’s Message to Get Tough
headline.main: Altidore Hears Coach’s Message to U.S. National Team: Get Tough
headline.print_headline: Altidore Hears Coach’s Message to U.S. National Team: Get Tough
